Text:
Almost made the mistake of taking it for the new one.Luckily didn't use the torrent from the RSS feed. The uploader should have mentioned it [the year] in the torrent's name itself.
Nice movie though!
Are there subtitles. If so, in what languages?

Forced subs only

Enjoy the classic!!!

This movie is closer to the facts than the more recent 300. It deals more with the politics of the time, of trying to get the city states working together. Furthermore, Xerxes looks more like he would have looked, rather than the travesty of the 300 portrayal. A pity there are not more seeds for this version, because although it lacks the fancy CGI effects, it is better than 300.
